scripts.build:backend: vite -c vite.config.backend.ts build && sed -i '' 's/export export/export/g' src/api/api.zod.ts
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:backend && npm run lint && npm run build:frontend && youtrack-app validate dist
scripts.build:nolint: npm run clean && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && youtrack-app validate dist
scripts.pack: rm -rf tms.zip && npx --yes bestzip tms.zip dist/*
scripts.upload-local: set -a && source .env && set +a && youtrack-app upload dist --host $YOUTRACK_HOST --token $YOUTRACK_TOKEN
scripts.update: npm run build && npm run upload-local
scripts.prepare:watch: npm run clean && vite -c vite.config.backend.ts build --mode development
scripts.watch:build: npm run prepare:watch && (AUTOUPLOAD=true npm run watch:backend & while [ ! -f src/api/api.d.ts ] || [ ! -f src/api/api.zod.ts ]; do sleep 0.5; done && AUTOUPLOAD=true npm run watch:frontend)
